description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP and ABAP Platform - versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, 791, has multiple vulnerabilities in a class for test purposes in which an attacker authenticated as a non-administrative user can craft a request with certain parameters, which will consume the server's resources sufficiently to make it unavailable. There is no ability to view or modify any information.
